cohort.name: No First Consult Created Within 48 Hours
cohort.story: In our recent analysis, we observed that 11% of users in the cohort of 299 did not create their first consult within 48 hours of activation. This indicates a potential barrier in the onboarding process that could be streamlined to enhance user engagement and workflow efficiency.

sequence.cta: Log in to create your first consult and streamline your workflow.
Reminder: Your first consult is waiting. Access it now to save time.
Need assistance? Check our resources to help you get started.
